body_html:
@aselle i uninstall nvidia driver and cuda and tensorflow-gpu (via pip) and install again

try to install from source code (to write GPU card with CUDA Compute Capability of my driver) show error in build

when i run


I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:885] Found device 0 with properties: 
name: GeForce GT 620M
major: 2 minor: 1 memoryClockRate (GHz) 1.25
pciBusID 0000:01:00.0
Total memory: 964.44MiB
Free memory: 756.19MiB
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:906] DMA: 0 
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:916] 0:   Y 
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:948] Ignoring visible gpu device (device: 0, name: GeForce GT 620M, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0) with Cuda compute capability 2.1. The minimum required Cuda capability is 3.0.

can i change configuration to 2.1 ? or my drive will not work ever ?

body:
@aselle   i uninstall nvidia driver and cuda and tensorflow-gpu (via pip) and install again

try to install from source code (to write GPU card with CUDA Compute Capability of my driver) show error in build

when i run 
```

I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:885] Found device 0 with properties: 
name: GeForce GT 620M
major: 2 minor: 1 memoryClockRate (GHz) 1.25
pciBusID 0000:01:00.0
Total memory: 964.44MiB
Free memory: 756.19MiB
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:906] DMA: 0 
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:916] 0:   Y 
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:948] Ignoring visible gpu device (device: 0, name: GeForce GT 620M, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0) with Cuda compute capability 2.1. The minimum required Cuda capability is 3.0.
```

can i change configuration to 2.1 ? or my drive will not work ever ?
